title: How did Dawn French lose weight? Fans stunned by funny woman’s “ageless” appearance
text:
How did Dawn French lose weight? Fans stunned by funny woman’s “ageless” appearance The Vicar of Dibley star shed seven stone Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Dawn French stunned viewers with her youthful appearance on This Morning today. 
Wearing a floral kimono-style top with pink velvet boots, the funny woman looked to be in marvellous health. 
And fans were left in disbelief when The Vicar of Dibley star revealed that she will turn 60 in October. 
“You look so absolutely stunning and ageless,” one fan tweeted Dawn French looked "ageless" on This Morning today (Photo: Rex Features) Dawn French in 2001 before her dramatic weight loss (Photo: Apex) 
“You are dazzling!” another wrote 
“I swear you’re getting younger #doriangray looking amazing,” a third fan shared. 
Dawn lost a whopping seven-and-a-half stone nearly six years ago. Dawn lost seven-and-a-half stone (Photo: Rex Features) 
But speaking in 2014, she revealed her dramatic weight loss was because of she had a hysterectomy after a cancer scare . 
“I became quite ill about three years ago, with all kinds of hell ​kicking off in here, where I keep my lady plumbing,” she said on stage during her one-woman show. 
“Anyway, I eventually went to hospital, and my doc was so convinced I had uterine cancer, that he ordered a second biopsy to be sure, when the first one was clear. Even before the result of the second one, I decided to be done with my old enemy, my defunct reproductive stuff. It was curtailing my life. The funny woman returns to our screens tonight (Photo: ITV) 
“So my womb and I parted company. Goodbye. When I was due to have my hysterectomy the doc told me that if I could lose some weight before the op, they would be able to do it via ‘key-hole’, and I would recover in three weeks or so. 
“Otherwise it would be big open surgery, and three months to recover. So, I set about dropping a few stone. No magic wand, just tiny, joyless low-cal eating and lots more walking for weeks and weeks. It was grim. I lost seven and a half stone. I could have the keyhole surgery. Great. That’s all it was, practical.” 
The huge weight loss came around 14 months after her split from her marriage to Lenny Henry and at the time was thought to be due to her heartache and eating more healthily. She will host Little Big Shots (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) 
Dawn will return to our screens tonight as the host of ITV's newest show, Little Big Shots. 
She’s on the lookout for the very best in young fresh talent, and will get it all on film for ITV. 
Little Big Shots intends to showcase the amazing skills of some of the most talented children from all over the country in a show that is basically Britain's Got Talent, but for children. Like us on Facebook
